readme:
# MGnify's amplicon (v5.0) quality control subworkflow for single end data

## Input datasets

- **Single-end reada** A collection containing single-end reads.

## Input values

- **Trimmomatic - SLIDING WINDOW - Average quality required** (Default = 15)
- **Trimmomatic - LEADING** Minimum quality required to keep a base, (Default = 3)
- **Trimmomatic - TRAILING** Minimum quality required to keep a base, (Default = 3)
- **Trimmomatic - SLIDING WINDOW - Number of bases to average across** (Default = 4)
- **Trimmomatic - MINLEN** Minimum length of reads to be kept, (Default = 100)
- **Trimmomatic - Quality score encoding** The phred+64 encoding works the same as the phred+33 encoding, except you add 64 to the phred score to determine the ascii code of the quality character, (Default = Phred33)
- **Length filtering - Minimum size** Minimum sequence length, (Default = 100)
- **Ambiguity filtering - Maximal N percentage threshold to conserve sequences** Maximal N percentage threshold to conserve sequences, (Default = 10)

## Processing

This subworkflow executes the following quality control steps:

- **Trimmomatic** Filtering and trimming reads using trimmomatic
- **Filter FASTQ** Filter reads shorter than 100 bp
- **PRINSEQ** Ambiguity filtering
changelog:
# Changelog

## [0.3] - 2025-03-10

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_find_and_replace/9.3+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_find_and_replace/9.5+galaxy0`

## [0.2] - 2025-02-24

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy3`

## [0.1] - 10-05-2024
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1020 460" role="img" aria-label="MGnify amplicon pipeline v5 quality control single-end workflow diagram">
  <title>MGnify Amplicon Pipeline v5.0 - Quality Control SE</title>
  <desc>Quality control subworkflow for single-end reads: trimming with Trimmomatic, length filtering, ambiguity filtering with PRINSEQ, format conversion, and MultiQC reporting.</desc>
  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>
  <rect width="1020" height="460" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1020" height="460" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1020" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">MGnify Amplicon Pipeline v5.0 - Quality Control (Single-End)</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- Input -> Trimmomatic -->
  <path d="M 180 115 C 220 115, 240 115, 270 115" class="connection"/>
  <!-- Trimmomatic -> Filter FASTQ -->
  <path d="M 470 115 C 500 115, 500 115, 520 115" class="connection"/>
  <!-- Filter FASTQ -> PRINSEQ -->
  <path d="M 720 115 C 750 115, 750 115, 770 115" class="connection"/>
  <!-- PRINSEQ -> FASTA output -->
  <path d="M 770 155 C 750 185, 550 260, 510 270" class="connection"/>

  <!-- QC branch: Input -> FastQC -> MultiQC -->
  <path d="M 180 130 C 220 180, 220 280, 270 280" class="connection-qc"/>
  <!-- Trimmomatic -> FastQC -->
  <path d="M 470 130 C 500 180, 400 280, 470 280" class="connection-qc"/>
  <!-- Filter FASTQ -> FastQC -->
  <path d="M 720 130 C 750 180, 600 280, 670 280" class="connection-qc"/>
  <!-- PRINSEQ -> FastQC -->
  <path d="M 830 155 C 850 220, 780 280, 870 280" class="connection-qc"/>

  <!-- FastQC nodes -> MultiQC -->
  <path d="M 350 310 C 370 360, 440 360, 460 360" class="connection-qc" style="opacity:0"/>

  <!-- MultiQC outputs -->
  <path d="M 590 280 C 610 310, 350 350, 310 350" class="connection-qc" style="opacity:0"/>

  <!-- NODES -->
  <!-- Input: Single-end reads -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20,80)">
    <rect width="180" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">1:</text>
    <text x="24" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Single-end Reads</text>
    <text x="90" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">list collection</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="35" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="180" cy="50" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Trimmomatic -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(270,80)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">2:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">Trimmomatic</text>
    <text x="100" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Quality trimming</text>
    <text x="100" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Sliding window + LEADING/TRAILING</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Filter FASTQ (length filtering) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(520,80)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">3:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">Length Filtering</text>
    <text x="100" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Filter FASTQ by size</text>
    <text x="100" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Min length threshold</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PRINSEQ (ambiguity filtering) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(770,80)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">4:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">PRINSEQ</text>
    <text x="100" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Ambiguity filtering</text>
    <text x="100" y="66" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">N-base percentage filter</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- FastQC (grouped, shown as QC annotation) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(270,245)">
    <rect width="200" height="60" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">5:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">FastQC (x4 stages)</text>
    <text x="100" y="48" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Quality assessment at each step</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="30" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Outputs -->
  <!-- FASTA output -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(350,340)">
    <rect width="180" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="180" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="90" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">QC FASTA Files</text>
    <text x="90" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">fasta</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- MultiQC report -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(620,340)">
    <rect width="180" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="20" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="180" height="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="90" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">MultiQC Report</text>
    <text x="90" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">html + statistics</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Output connections -->
  <path d="M 870 170 C 870 250, 550 330, 530 340" class="connection"/>
  <path d="M 470 275 C 530 310, 600 340, 620 365" class="connection-qc"/>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(20,435)">
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#495057">Legend:</text>
    <rect x="60" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="80" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Input</text>
    <line x1="120" y1="-4" x2="160" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="168" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="240" y1="-4" x2="280" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="288" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">QC metrics</text>
    <rect x="360" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="380" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Output</text>
    <rect x="430" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="450" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Report</text>
  </g>
</svg>
